channel.title: How do you make a basic private server
channel.description:
Alright, I have seen tons of tutorials online everywhere and I have tried servers in the "Server Downloads" page, but either A) They don't work for me or B) They restrict you to an area that you can't leave. All I want to do is have a private server that only I can play on, is that possible or not? And if so, how would one go about making one? Thank you in advance.
Also, I should have mentioned this... I would like a "Newer" private server. I don't want RuneScape Classic, I would prefer the latest version but if that's not available I would like to have the next best thing please :D

item.title: How do you make a basic private server
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

If only you want to play on a server, try moparscape’s aryan server or whatever it’s called

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a basic private server

item.title: How do you make a basic private server
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Yes, the downloads section has plenty of higher revision servers.

Explain why it’s not letting you on instead of moving to the next source.

They don’t limit you to one area, you might have to change things around if you want them differently.

If you want it so only you can play on it, use localhost 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a basic private server
